data.prayer: Father, convict the 550,561 believers in Bukidnon to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bukidnon, Philippines
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Bukidnon, Philippines the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Bukidnon who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Bukidnon, Philippines.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Maguindanao people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, move the 550,561 believers in the state of Bukidnon to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Bukidnon, Philippines to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bukidnon, Philippines has a population of 3,952,400.

We estimate Bukidnon has 550,561 people who might know Jesus, 3,044,751 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 357,087 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Bukidnon, Philippines to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

location.name: Bukidnon
location.cities_list: NIA Valencia, Malaybalay, Maramag, Quezon, Manolo Fortich
location.cities_list_w_pop: NIA Valencia (83,591), Malaybalay (61,524), Maramag (33,844), Quezon (27,212), Manolo Fortich (27,064)
